name: as4lControllerGroup
description: This group exists to bind and execute control logic for the task creation of the AnalysisScore4LMS package. This group will be visually hidden.

fields.name: as4lControllerWidget
fields.description: This field holds the widget for the controller logic.

fields.name: dataStorageGroup
fields.description: In this group dummy-fields are created to transfer aditional data from content creation to content view.

name: paragraphs
label: Paragraphs
description: Each paragraph may contain a text, multiple notations and multiple media

fields.name: notations
fields.label: Notations
fields.description: Notations in paragraphs will not be interactive while solving the task.

fields.name: interactiveSVG
fields.label: Interactive Notation
fields.description: When checkbox is marked, the notation will be interactive in content view, otherwise only the SVG will be used.

fields.name: mediaList
fields.label: Media
fields.description: Add any number of videos, pictures or audio

fields.name: type
fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display under description.

name: selectInteractiveNotation
label: Interactive Notation
description: Choose whether or not to provide an interactive score editor to complete the task.

name: noInteractDesc
label: Description
description: All interactive notations in the solution view are disabled. Only paragraphs will be shown.

name: taskConfig
label: Task Configurations
description: Select the properties of the task.

fields.name: checkPitch
fields.label: Check Pitch Class
fields.description: Check for the correct pitch class of the notes (single, chord or polyphonic).

fields.name: checkOctavePosition
fields.label: Check Octave Position
fields.description: Check for the correct octave position of each note.

fields.name: checkDuration
fields.label: Check Duration
fields.description: Check for the correct duration of each note (single, chord or polyphonic).

fields.name: checkHarmLabels
fields.label: Check Harmony Labels
fields.description: Check for the correct position and contents of harmony labels.

fields.name: checkTextboxes
fields.label: Check Textboxes
fields.description: Check for the right contents of annotation boxes.

fields.name: grading
fields.label: Enable Grading
fields.description: When checked, points are awarded based on the percentage of correct answers. Otherwise, students can review and repeat the task as many times as they wish.

fields.name: showSolution
fields.label: Enable Solution Button
fields.description: When checked, students will have access to the provided solution. When 'Enable Grading' is checked as well, the solution button will be visible after submitting the task.

fields.name: retry
fields.label: Enable Retry Button
fields.description: When checked, students will are able to redo the task. When 'Enable Grading' is checked as well, the retry button will be visible after submitting the task.

fields.name: passPercentage
fields.label: Pass percentage
fields.description: Percentage score required to pass the task.

name: soundToAlign
label: Sound Alignment
description: Load a sound file and align it with the solutionscore

fields.name: type
fields.label: Sound To Align
fields.description: Optional media to display under description.

name: interactiveNotation_modelSolution
label: Solution
description: This view serves as the model solution. You might copy the contents to the student view.

fields.name: notationWidget_modelSolution
fields.label: Solution
fields.description: This view serves as the model solution. You might copy the contents to the student view.

name: interactiveNotation_studentView
label: Student View
description: This view serves as the model solution. You might copy the contents to the student view.

fields.name: notationWidget_studentView
fields.label: Student View
fields.description: This view will be shown while completing the task. You can delete elements that can be filled in later.
